pr_title: Created ExprDropsOfBlock to get the drops of a block

timeline.message: Created ExprDropsOfBlock to get the drops of a block
Added SkriptDocs and a fall back in case people used 'as %entity%' when that didn't exist
Removed said fallback and added a check to see their version in the init method

timeline.bodyText: use ItemType, not ItemStack. Also, it should support multiple blocks
timeline.author: FranKusmiruk

replies.bodyText: It's rather complex to explain here but basically, Skript only passes around itemtypes, not itemstacks and even if it may make this specific case a bit more complex, it's better for expressions to encourage the usage of ItemType so that addon developers don't start passing ItemStacks around and generating weird behaviour in some expressions.
replies.author: FranKusmiruk

replies.bodyText: 👍 okay I'll add that afterwards, thanks
replies.author: DeltaRays

replies.bodyText: You could also split this into multiple lines
replies.author: Nicofisi
DeltaRays

timeline.bodyText: We tend to directly not register the pattern in those cases, not sure if this is better though
timeline.author: FranKusmiruk

replies.bodyText: I'd leave it like this as it can still be used, just without the entity
replies.author: DeltaRays

replies.bodyText: I mean, not registering the pattern in the versions it does not work. But I believe we can leave it like this since it'll be less confusing to users.
replies.author: FranKusmiruk

replies.bodyText: can you please cache the result of the methodExists calls?
replies.author: Pikachu920

timeline.message: Used ArrayList's instead of Arrays, updated everything to use itemtypes, and supported getting drops of multiple blocks

timeline.bodyText: Can you put each pattern on it's own line?
timeline.author: APickledWalrus

timeline.bodyText: The 'as %entity%' note would probably be better in the RequiredPlugins annotation
timeline.author: APickledWalrus
APickledWalrus

timeline.bodyText: Could you add the using %itemtype% and as %entity% to this?
timeline.author: APickledWalrus

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            			"drops of %blocks% [(using|with) %-itemtype% [(1¦as %-entity%)]]",
          
          
            
            			"(all of the|all the|all) drops of %blocks% [(using|with) %-itemtype% [(1¦as %-entity%)]]",
timeline.author: APickledWalrus

timeline.bodyText:
My suggestion was flawed - sorry about that!

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            			"[(all|all [of] the)] drops of %blocks% [(using|with) %-itemtype% [(1¦as %-entity%)]]",
          
          
            
            			"[(all|the|all [of] the)] drops of %blocks% [(using|with) %-itemtype% [(1¦as %-entity%)]]",
timeline.author: APickledWalrus
